segments.text: I'm number seven . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hah hah ! You have to go before me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You think it's funny . I'm terrified .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I've never jumped off anything in my life . The highest thing I've jumped off is my bed . I'm scared .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are the one who wanted to come here , Sandy . You should enjoy it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess I'm adventuresome , but then I'm scared too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not too scared . But I've done sky diving before .
segments.speaker: S2
